title.rendered: December 2020, Speaker during the Launching of the Youth

content.rendered: December 2020, Speaker during the Launching of the Youth Fusion which is the new platform and nuclear abolition action plan being launched by the youth group of Abolition 2000, the global civil society network for the elimination of nuclear weapons. Youth Fusion
